title: [Bug]: Teams app notifications are not showing up in system notification center
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

The issue is that when I get a notification on the app, that is not reflected in the system notification center. For other apps, when they receive a notification, it is shown in the system notification center. Everytime I need to check the teams notifications, I have to open the app. PS: The popup appears but just that it is not collected in the system notification center.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.11

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Notification comes in the app
2. Pop up is displayed
3. But in the system notification center, the notification is not present.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown

```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

_No response_
